# Explore your data interactively

## Overview
This addin allows you to interactively explore your data by visualizing it with the ggplot2 package.
For the full documentation visit: https://github.com/dreamRs/esquisse

## Code
```{r}
# All you need to do is install and launch the add in, no additional code

esquisse::esquisser(palmerpenguins::penguins)

```
